java/liquibase/change/AddLookupTableChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.*;
00004 import liquibase.database.sql.RawSqlStatement;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.ReorganizeTableStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00009 import liquibase.database.structure.ForeignKey;
00010 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00011 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00013 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00014 
00015 import java.util.*;
00016 
00021 public class AddLookupTableChange extends AbstractChange {
00022 
00023     private String existingTableSchemaName;
00024     private String existingTableName;
00025     private String existingColumnName;
00026 
00027     private String newTableSchemaName;
00028     private String newTableName;
00029     private String newColumnName;
00030     private String newColumnDataType;
00031     private String constraintName;
00032 
00033     public AddLookupTableChange() {
00034         super("addLookupTable", "Add Lookup Table");
00035     }
00036 
00037     public String getExistingTableSchemaName() {
00038         return existingTableSchemaName;
00039     }
00040 
00041     public void setExistingTableSchemaName(String existingTableSchemaName) {
00042         this.existingTableSchemaName = existingTableSchemaName;
00043     }
00044 
00045     public String getExistingTableName() {
00046         return existingTableName;
00047     }
00048 
00049     public void setExistingTableName(String existingTableName) {
00050         this.existingTableName = existingTableName;
00051     }
00052 
00053     public String getExistingColumnName() {
00054         return existingColumnName;
00055     }
00056 
00057     public void setExistingColumnName(String existingColumnName) {
00058         this.existingColumnName = existingColumnName;
00059     }
00060 
00061 
00062     public String getNewTableSchemaName() {
00063         return newTableSchemaName;
00064     }
00065 
00066     public void setNewTableSchemaName(String newTableSchemaName) {
00067         this.newTableSchemaName = newTableSchemaName;
00068     }
00069 
00070     public String getNewTableName() {
00071         return newTableName;
00072     }
00073 
00074     public void setNewTableName(String newTableName) {
00075         this.newTableName = newTableName;
00076     }
00077 
00078     public String getNewColumnName() {
00079         return newColumnName;
00080     }
00081 
00082     public void setNewColumnName(String newColumnName) {
00083         this.newColumnName = newColumnName;
00084     }
00085

00087         return newColumnDataType;
00088     }
00089 
00090     public void setNewColumnDataType(String newColumnDataType) {
00091         this.newColumnDataType = newColumnDataType;
00092     }

00094     public String getConstraintName() {
00095         return constraintName;
00096     }
00097 
00098     public String getFinalConstraintName() {
00099         if (constraintName == null) {
00100             return ("FK_" + getExistingTableName() + "_" + getNewTableName()).toUpperCase();
00101         } else {
00102             return constraintName;
00103         }
00104     }
00105 
00106     public void setConstraintName(String constraintName) {
00107         this.constraintName = constraintName;
00108     }
00109 
00110     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00111         DropForeignKeyConstraintChange dropFK = new DropForeignKeyConstraintChange();
00112         dropFK.setBaseTableSchemaName(getExistingTableSchemaName());
00113         dropFK.setBaseTableName(getExistingTableName());
00114         dropFK.setConstraintName(getFinalConstraintName());
00115 
00116         DropTableChange dropTable = new DropTableChange();
00117         dropTable.setSchemaName(getNewTableSchemaName());
00118         dropTable.setTableName(getNewTableName());
00119 
00120         return new Change[]{
00121                 dropFK,
00122                 dropTable,
00123         };
00124     }
00125 
00126     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00127         if (database instanceof DerbyDatabase) {
00128             throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Add Lookup Table currently not supported in Derby");
00129         } else if (database instanceof HsqlDatabase) {
00130             throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Add Lookup Table currently not supported in HSQLDB");
00131         } else if (database instanceof CacheDatabase) {
00132             throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Add Lookup Table not currently supported for Cache");
00133         } else if (database instanceof FirebirdDatabase) {
00134             throw new UnsupportedChangeException("Add Lookup Table not currently supported for Firebird");
00135         }
00136 
00137         List<SqlStatement> statements = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00138 
00139         String newTableSchemaName = getNewTableSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getNewTableSchemaName();
00140         String existingTableSchemaName = getExistingTableSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getExistingTableSchemaName();
00141 
00142         SqlStatement[] createTablesSQL = {new RawSqlStatement("CREATE TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(newTableSchemaName, getNewTableName()) + " AS SELECT DISTINCT " + getExistingColumnName() + " AS " + getNewColumnName() + " FROM " + database.escapeTableName(existingTableSchemaName, getExistingTableName()) + " WHERE " + getExistingColumnName() + " IS NOT NULL")};
00143         if (database instanceof MSSQLDatabase) {
00144             createTablesSQL = new SqlStatement[]{new RawSqlStatement("SELECT DISTINCT " + getExistingColumnName() + " AS " + getNewColumnName() + " INTO " + database.escapeTableName(newTableSchemaName, getNewTableName()) + " FROM " + database.escapeTableName(existingTableSchemaName, getExistingTableName()) + " WHERE " + getExistingColumnName() + " IS NOT NULL"),};
00145         } else if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00146             createTablesSQL = new SqlStatement[]{
00147                     new RawSqlStatement("CREATE TABLE " + database.escapeTableName(newTableSchemaName, getNewTableName()) + " AS (SELECT " + getExistingColumnName() + " AS " + getNewColumnName() + " FROM " + database.escapeTableName(existingTableSchemaName, getExistingTableName()) + ") WITH NO DATA"),
00148                     new RawSqlStatement("INSERT INTO " + database.escapeTableName(newTableSchemaName, getNewTableName()) + " SELECT DISTINCT " + getExistingColumnName() + " FROM " + database.escapeTableName(existingTableSchemaName, getExistingTableName()) + " WHERE " + getExistingColumnName() + " IS NOT NULL"),
00149             };
00150         }
00151 
00152         statements.addAll(Arrays.asList(createTablesSQL));
00153 
00154         if (!(database instanceof OracleDatabase)) {
00155             AddNotNullConstraintChange addNotNullChange = new AddNotNullConstraintChange();
00156             addNotNullChange.setSchemaName(newTableSchemaName);
00157             addNotNullChange.setTableName(getNewTableName());
00158             addNotNullChange.setColumnName(getNewColumnName());
00159             addNotNullChange.setColumnDataType(getNewColumnDataType());
00160             statements.addAll(Arrays.asList(addNotNullChange.generateStatements(database)));
00161         }
00162 
00163         if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00164             statements.add(new ReorganizeTableStatement(newTableSchemaName, getNewTableName()));
00165         }
00166 
00167         AddPrimaryKeyChange addPKChange = new AddPrimaryKeyChange();
00168         addPKChange.setSchemaName(newTableSchemaName);
00169         addPKChange.setTableName(getNewTableName());
00170         addPKChange.setColumnNames(getNewColumnName());
00171         statements.addAll(Arrays.asList(addPKChange.generateStatements(database)));
00172 
00173         if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00174             statements.add(new ReorganizeTableStatement(newTableSchemaName, getNewTableName()));
00175         }
00176 
00177         AddForeignKeyConstraintChange addFKChange = new AddForeignKeyConstraintChange();
00178         addFKChange.setBaseTableSchemaName(existingTableSchemaName);
00179         addFKChange.setBaseTableName(getExistingTableName());
00180         addFKChange.setBaseColumnNames(getExistingColumnName());
00181         addFKChange.setReferencedTableSchemaName(newTableSchemaName);
00182         addFKChange.setReferencedTableName(getNewTableName());
00183         addFKChange.setReferencedColumnNames(getNewColumnName());
00184 
00185         addFKChange.setConstraintName(getFinalConstraintName());
00186         statements.addAll(Arrays.asList(addFKChange.generateStatements(database)));
00187 
00188         return statements.toArray(new SqlStatement[statements.size()]);
00189     }
00190 
00191     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00192         return "Lookup table added for "+getExistingTableName()+"."+getExistingColumnName();
00193     }
00194 
00195     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00196         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00197         if (getExistingTableSchemaName() != null) {
00198             node.setAttribute("newTableSchemaName", getExistingTableSchemaName());
00199         }
00200         node.setAttribute("existingTableName", getExistingTableName());
00201         node.setAttribute("existingColumnName", getExistingColumnName());
00202 
00203         if (getNewTableSchemaName() != null) {
00204             node.setAttribute("newTableSchemaName", getNewTableSchemaName());
00205         }
00206 
00207         node.setAttribute("newTableName", getNewTableName());
00208         node.setAttribute("newColumnName", getNewColumnName());
00209         node.setAttribute("constraintName", getConstraintName());
00210 
00211         return node;
00212     }
00213 
00214     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00215         Set<DatabaseObject> returnSet = new HashSet<DatabaseObject>();
00216 
00217         Table existingTable = new Table(getExistingTableName());
00218         returnSet.add(existingTable);
00219 
00220         Column existingColumn = new Column();
00221         existingColumn.setTable(existingTable);
00222         existingColumn.setName(getExistingColumnName());
00223         returnSet.add(existingColumn);
00224 
00225         Table newTable = new Table(getNewTableName());
00226         returnSet.add(newTable);
00227 
00228         Column newColumn = new Column();
00229         newColumn.setTable(existingTable);
00230         newColumn.setName(getNewColumnName());
00231         returnSet.add(newColumn);
00232 
00233         ForeignKey fk = new ForeignKey();
00234         fk.setForeignKeyTable(existingTable);
00235         fk.setForeignKeyColumns(existingColumn.getName());
00236         fk.setPrimaryKeyTable(newTable);
00237         fk.setPrimaryKeyColumns(newColumn.getName());
00238         returnSet.add(fk);
00239 
00240         return returnSet;
00241 
00242     }
00243 }
